Conjuration 3

Summon Mazzikim

Various nations(4)

Ritual
N1
spell id [id]: 269
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 2072
number of effects [nreff]: 8
gems required [gemcost]: 3N
Summon Units:#2072 Mazzik x 8
The caster summons a group of Mazzikim from the wild. Mazzikim are imps of the wild who terrorize unwary travelers. They are mischievous rather than malign, but can cause some havoc in enough numbers. Since they are of this world, they can be summoned without a sacrifice of blood, even if demonic by nature.
